1 #ifndef SRC_LOGGER_H
2 #define SRC_LOGGER_H
3 
4 #include "ros/ros.h"
5 #include <cpp-common/ILogger.h>
6 
7 class Logger : public ILogger {
8  public:
9  Logger() {}
10 
11  LogRet log(LogLevel level, const char* format, ...) override {
12  va_list args;
13  va_start(args, format);
14  int retVal = formatAndAppend(format, args);
15  va_end(args);
16 
17  flush(level);
18 
19  if (retVal >= 0) {
20  return LogRet::Ok;
21  } else {
22  return LogRet::Error;
23  }
24  }
25 
26  int formatAndAppend(const char* format, va_list args) {
27  // Copy varargs
28  va_list vaCopy;
29  va_copy(vaCopy, args);
30  const int requiredLength = std::vsnprintf(NULL, 0, format, vaCopy);
31  va_end(vaCopy);
32 
33  // Create a string with adequate length
34  std::string tmpStr;
35  tmpStr.resize((size_t)requiredLength);
36 
37  // Build a new string
38  int retValue = vsnprintf(tmpStr.data(), tmpStr.size() + 1, format, args);
39  m_accumulatedString = m_accumulatedString + tmpStr;
40 
41  return retValue;
42  }
43 
44  void flush(LogLevel level) {
45  switch (level) {
46  case LogLevel::Debug:
47  ROS_DEBUG("%s", m_accumulatedString.c_str());
48  break;
49  case LogLevel::Info:
50  ROS_INFO("%s", m_accumulatedString.c_str());
51  break;
52  case LogLevel::Warn:
53  ROS_WARN("%s", m_accumulatedString.c_str());
54  break;
55  case LogLevel::Error:
56  ROS_ERROR("%s", m_accumulatedString.c_str());
57  break;
58  }
59 
60  m_accumulatedString = "";
61  }
62 
63  private:
64  std::string m_accumulatedString;
65 };
66 
67 #endif // SRC_LOGGER_H
